description.title: Events: web3js client contract.getPastEvents, filter and topics
description.purpose: Uses filter and topic to extract events of interest as a polling approach using getPastLogs. It filters on a set of integer fields, and on a string field. As a string it seems you cannot filter within web3, but rather you sha3 the string value and specify it in the topic list as part of the bloom filters. Note that for Obscuro, the subscriber goes through the WE where the accounts viewing key has already been registered, so there is no need to do this explicitly.
